Original:
Brewery Taproom在台灣精釀啤酒界享有盛譽，在台北和台中設有多家分店。為了慶祝旅行的最後一晚，我去了忠孝復興站附近的分店。

當我去歐洲旅行時，我通常會在酒吧結束一天的生活，但在亞洲，我不經常這樣做，因為酒吧文化尚未建立。最大的原因是，要先找到一家酒吧並不容易。

在台灣，這不是一個人們喝酒很多的文化，所以我其實根本沒想過酒吧。我以為我會喝很多台灣啤酒，但作為一個麥克老鴨，我很高興發現這個時髦的地方。

這家酒吧分店由具有美食酒吧感覺的一樓和具有俱樂部氛圍的地下室組成。我去的時候，一樓沒有座位，所以被引導到了地下室，地下室幾乎坐滿了。

如果你看菜單，你會發現他們在多樣化的啤酒和小吃上下了很大的功夫，但價格與台灣的價格相比有點高。晚餐時，我點了一個自製漢堡和一杯啤酒。

這是一款招牌淡啤酒，與漢堡搭配得很好。他們只賣600毫升的規格是有原因的。

我點的手工漢堡是經典的漢堡，裡面有兩個肉餅、起司、番茄和生菜，旁邊還有我點餐時選擇的薯條。麵包，我用了奶油蛋捲。

味道非常好，因為我個人更喜歡像這樣成分均衡的漢堡，而不是肉太多的漢堡。最重要的是，肉餅是手工漢堡的核心，裡面充滿了多汁的肉。

當我咬一口時，肉餅的肥膩和煙熏味就出來了，但很快蔬菜就變得有嚼勁，清理了我的口腔，這是我非常喜歡的。更不用說與啤酒搭配了。

令人失望的一件事是薯條太薄而且乏味。又厚又鬆軟的炸薯條最適合搭配漢堡或啤酒。

吃完漢堡和啤酒後，是時候開始喝啤酒了，按照我們通常的飲用順序，我們繼續喝 IPA。就像 IPA 一樣，它有苦味和啤酒花味，但混合了柑橘的味道。

我不斷增加酒精含量，最後是長島冰啤酒，一種水果啤酒，但酒精含量很高，而且果味濃鬱，我以為是某種雞尾酒。然後我去喝第二杯雞尾酒。
EN:
Brewery Taproom enjoys a reputation in the craft beer industry in Taiwan, with many branches in Taipei and Taichung.To celebrate the last night of the trip, I went to the branch near Zhongxiao Fuxing Station.

When I travel to Europe, I usually end the day of life in the bar, but in Asia, I do not do this often because the bar culture has not yet been established.The biggest reason is that it is not easy to find a bar first.

In Taiwan, this is not a culture of people who drink a lot of alcohol, so I have never thought about bars at all.I thought I would drink a lot of Taiwanese beer, but as a Macing duck, I was glad to discover this fashionable place.

This bar branch consists of the first floor of the gourmet bar and the basement with the club atmosphere.When I went, there was no seat on the first floor, so I was guided to the basement, and the basement was almost filled.

If you look at the menu, you will find that they have worked a lot on diverse beer and snacks, but the price is a bit higher than the price of Taiwan.During dinner, I ordered a homemade burger and a glass of beer.

This is a signature light beer, which is well matched with burgers.They only sell 600 ml of specifications for a reason.

The handmade burger I ordered is a classic burger with two meat pie, cheese, tomatoes and lettuce, and there is the fries that I choose when I order meals.Bread, I used cream egg rolls.

The taste is very good, because I personally prefer burgers with balanced ingredients, not burgers with too many meat.The most important thing is that the meat cake is the core of the hand -made burger, which is full of juicy meat.

When I bite a bite, the fatty and smoky flavor of the meat cake came out, but soon the vegetables became chewy and cleaned my mouth. This is what I like very much.Not to mention matching with beer.

The disappointing thing is that the fries are too thin and boring.The thick and soft fries are most suitable for burgers or beer.

After eating burgers and beer, it is time to start drinking beer. According to our usual drinking order, we continue to drink IPA.Just like IPA, it has bitterness and beer flavor, but it mixes the taste of citrus.

I continue to increase alcohol content. Finally, it is Long Island Ice Beer, a kind of fruit beer, but the alcohol content is very high and the fruit taste is strong. I think it is some kind of cocktail.Then I went to drink a second cup of cocktails.
